title: Should I take Byju in class 10? - Quora

response.answer_text: BYJU’s is useful as a supplementary learning source, meaning if some teacher is teaching you that concept and you have a doubt in that concept. I say so , because as you are in class 10 , the sheer amount of things that you study in class 11 may make you feel overwhelmed , so a strong base is necessary . For you to take BYJU’s , you must already know the concept and then take BYJU’s . if you just take the course , you will not understand anything. Trust Me. So you have 2 options and you may use BYJU’s in any of the two options additionally if you feel the need to. Buy the JEE foundation books available for class 10 . they are really good and once you go into 11th, it will help you a lot. The “Pearson IIT Foundation Series” books are really good and you will like them. If you completed them , Do JEE books for class 11 .( Message me if you want , and I will tell you the names, but most probably you wont need them, as the foundation books are large enough). Second Option is joining a nice Coaching institute . It helps if you start your preparation via a coaching center from class 10. So , if I want to summarise , either buy the Pearson books and do self study or join a coaching institute and in either the cases if you want take BYJU’s but don’t negelect the two cases and ONLY do BYJU’s , you wont understand anything. Thank You

BYJU’S class 10th learning program offers an in-depth, engaging and personalized learning experience. It’s interesting to see how the app breaks down complex concepts into easy micro concepts, thus allowing students to relate, understand and learn. The video lectures use a lot of real life examples there by helping students to relate and understand concepts better. Based on every student's learning capacity, the app offers customized test modules, personalized performance analysis, recommendations and shortcut techniques that guides students to learn and understand concepts better. The adaptive learning and test feature of the program ensures that the students learn each and every topic at their own pace and style which ultimately guides them to crack their final exams with ease. The learning program has been designed to help prepare students for the higher grades too. Be it for IIT-JEE or NEET, students can easily prepare for competitive exams as the learning program focuses on guiding students to understand the basics of every concept along with shortcut techniques and better time management skills. Also, the classes are delivered by India's best teachers explaining concepts through latest technology like in-air projections, interactive visuals enabling lifetime retention. For example - Understanding the concept of Gravitation on BYJU’S app is a lot more fun when you can see how gravity works.
